entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS] Margin set on CoillectionView cells isn't correctly taken into account #19240
  • AzDO Android build has error with `appium-doctor` #19239
  • Don't report Debug message for comments in XAML files for internal builds #19238
  • Custom Build Configurations require explicit iOS RuntimeIdentifier values in the csproj file. Can I set these using Conditions? #19235
  • When starting a new activity that inherits from MauiAppCompatActivity throw a better exception #19233
    Backlog
  • Monitoring Content/URL Changes in WebView for Blazor WASM Pages in .NET MAUI #19232
  • System.ObjectDisposedException: 'Cannot access a closed Stream on .net 8 maui android #19230
    Backlog
  • Very bad performance in net8 compared to net7 when creating views at runtime #19229
    Backlog
  • [testing] Bots on devdiv hanging on android device tests #19228
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Entry placeholder value is clear after clear button click in MAUI UWP #19226
  • [iOS] PushModalAsync navigation doesn't navigate #19225
  • CollectionView itemtemplate layout problem (WinUI) #19221
    Backlog
  • SearchHandler Command is not executed on iOS #19219
    Backlog
  • [MAUI 8] Label measurement is wrong, TailTruncation not working #19218
  • How do i fix this? Everytime i try to run mij code in vs it gives me a error #19217
  • Issue with iOS Screen Overlay and Non-Clickable Items in .NET MAUI #19216
  • Keyboard regression bugs in .NET 8 #19214
  • [Android] ScrollOrientation.Neither not disable scroll #19213
  • Custom Picker border not working on Android #19211
  • .NET MAUI app works both in debug and release mode on android but after publishing to apk. The app crashes on physical device. #19210
  • [Windows][CollectionView]Label Disappear when set Style in ContentPage.Resources #19209
  • Fails to bind dictionary to CollectionView on WinUI #19208
  • MacCatalyst Second Window With BlazorWebView Crashes App #19207
  • Maui CollectionView ChildAdded/Removed issues #19206

Closed

  • [iOS] Wrong default left/right margin in the navigation bar on iOS #19231
  • [WinUI] The app crashes when dragging Slider thumb near the end #17974
    Backlog
  • [WinUI] CollectionVIew scrolling performance #18510
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Maui - publish as exe dulicated the files #19220
  • How to customize Default About page on MacOS? #19222
  • Appium occasionally fails to install #19036
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • A new class created in Platform/Android folder of .NET MAUI project will have wrong namespace #17148

PullRequests

Created

  • Use System.Net.WebUtility.HtmlDecode instead of System.Web.HttpUtility.HtmlDecode #19237
  • [net9.0] Update net9.0 with new versions #19236
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Merged

  • [ci] Use the token from the variable group #19234
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [testing] Increase timeout for device tests #19184
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix flaky Appium install #19223
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • [Testing] Add SetSliderValue method to UITest #19182
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-slider, legacy-ui-test
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19205
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Save device logs when UI Tests fail #19085
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Fix resizing CV rows when content size changed #18932
    area/collectionview 📃, .NET 8 SR1
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing
  • NativeAOT: Add integration tests for testing MAUI compatibility with NativeAOT on iOS #19194
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout Header breaking clicking over items #19125
  • Translucent and Transparent NavigationBar on iOS #19204
    area/navigation 🧭, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, partner/cat 😻, .NET 8 SR2
  • Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18747
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard
  • [Testing] Add scroll methods to UITest #19181
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • [Testing] Add legacy CollectionView UITests #18979
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/collectionview 📃, area/testing, legacy-ui-test
  • Removed vestigial UpdateContentLayout() method left over from Forms #18856
    area/layout 🔲, partner/android
  • Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #19048
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add legacy ScrollView UITests #19054
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, layout-scrollview, legacy-ui-test
  • Add PostNotifications to Permissions #14456
    area/essentials 🍞, stale, Under Consideration
  • fix using local asset files on windows #16930
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-webview, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing
  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
